Method Detail

input

public java.lang.String input(java.lang.String prompt)
                       throws java.io.IOException
input method for command line of the program, can also be used for any other situation that requires user keyboard input please note that method turns all input to lower case which might cause problems with f.e. the load method but makes if-requests easier, change if necessary

Parameters:
prompt - the string of the prompt that should be displayed
Returns:
the user input
Throws:
java.io.IOException

displayLeaf

public void displayLeaf(LeafNode leaf,
                        int index,
                        boolean all)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Display the float values of a given leaf of the cart

Parameters:
leaf - the leaf that is to be displayed
index - its index as given in the program
all - true: show all units and floats of the leaf, false: use global variables to limit them
Throws:
java.io.IOException - because of the input lines

Find a given unit in the cart and return its leaf

Parameters:
index, - index of the unit to look for
Returns:
int of leaf index

eraseUnit

public void eraseUnit(int unit)
               throws java.io.IOException
Erase a given unit from its leaf, not overly used helper method

Parameters:
unit - index of the unit to erase
leaf - index of the leaf where the unit should be deleted from
Throws:
java.io.IOException

eraseUnitsFromLeaf

public int eraseUnitsFromLeaf(boolean reallyCut,
                              LeafNode lNode,
                              int[] units,
                              float cut,
                              java.io.PrintWriter pw,
                              boolean above,
                              boolean auto)
Erase some units from a leaf, more or less helper method for analyze()

Parameters:
reallyCut - set to false if you just want to have the statistics
lNode - the leaf to erase the units from
units - an array of the unit indices (null if erasing by cut-off value)
cut - the cut-off value (see boolean above below)
pw - print writer to log it, or null
above - true if units above cut should be erased, false if below is the case
auto - helper boolean for autoAnalyze, if true, don't give outln-output
Returns:
how many units have been deleted

filename - file where cart should be dumped in
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

dumpCart

public void dumpCart(java.lang.String filename)
              throws java.lang.Exception
Dump current cart in (binary) file for future MARY usage (i.e. final dump; use normal classification tree)

Parameters:
filename - file where cart should be dumped in
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

loadTreeFromFile

public ExtendedClassificationTree loadTreeFromFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                                   FeatureDefinition fD)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
Load an (Extended)ClassificationTree from a file, used for command load and initialisation of the program Also, show some statistics about the tree, therefore allowing quick diagnosis should something major have happened

Parameters:
filename - filename of tree
fD - the feature definition
Returns:
the loaded ExtendedClassificationTree
Throws:
java.io.IOException
